urls.title: Vehicles seized as part of clampdown on illegal waste activities in Lincolnshire
urls.description: Environment Agency staff joined forces for two days with officers from Lincolnshire Police, Boston Borough Council, HMRC and DVSA in Operation Clean Sweep.
